mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, EMP_NO, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_WRITER FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BOARD ( NOTICE_NO, EMP_NO, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CNT, NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES ( NOTICE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{empNo} , #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{noticeTitle}, 0, #{noticeWriter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_BOARD SET NOTICE_CNT = NOTICE_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
